text:
If you’re a huge Keeping Up with the Kardashians fan, you’ll remember Adrienne Bailon as the former Disney Cheetah Girl who later dated Rob Kardashian beginning in 2007 and made multiple cameos on the show.

The famous couple broke up after two years together and now Bailon is praising one of Rob’s sisters for helping her heal after their relationship came to an end. In a new episode of her talk show The Real, the star reveals that it was Kourtney Kardashian who offered a shoulder to cry on.

“When I broke up with Rob Kardashian, my breakup buddy was his sister Kourtney, who at the time had broken up with Scott [Disick] for a moment,” she said. “She was so much fun!”

Image zoom Kevin Winter/Getty

Bailon moved on to chronicle how exactly Kourtney was there to help. “I was definitely more the sad one crying at home, and she was like, ‘No, girl. We are going to go out. We’re going to hit the clubs in Hollywood. We’re going to have so much fun!’ And I needed that because we were both going through the same thing, but we dealt with the breakup differently.”

VIDEO: Kourtney Kardashian and Younes Bendjima Attend Their First Runway Show Together

So how’d things turn out for her? In 2016, Bailon married gospel singer Israel Houghton in Paris.

Next time we’re having boy trouble we know exactly who to call.
title: This Kardashian Sister Supported Adrienne Bailon After Her Breakup with Rob
